wikipedia_page.main: George Spruce (3 April 1923 –  14 October 1998) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender in The Football League for three clubs.

response: When Capper left Wrexham in 1955 after 48 league outings he was awarded a benefit match. After a short spell with non-league Headington United, he returned to professional circles with Lincoln City in January 1956. After struggling to command a regular place at Sincil Bank, Capper moved to Chester in September 1959 for £1,500. He competed with the centre back position with George Spruce before retiring from the game through injury in 1961.
